definition: the lap consisting of a turned-back hem encircling the end of the sleeve or leg, to confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
details:
noun
- the lap consisting of a turned-back hem encircling the end of the sleeve or leg
= synonyms: turnup
- shackle that consists of a metal loop that can be locked around the wrist
= synonyms: handcuff, handlock, manacle
verb
- to confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
= example: to confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
= synonyms: handcuff, manacle
- to hit with the hand
= example: to hit with the hand
= synonyms: whomp
